website_summaries.verdict: Rechargeable and highly adjustable, this auto-stirrer can handle everything from thin sauces to chunky chili.
pros: Two BPA-free stirring arms help keep your pan balanced
Adjusts to fit saucepans measuring 6" to 10.2" in diameter and between 4" and 8" high
Automatic stirrer is cordless and rechargeable - takes 4 hours to charge
Works with all kinds of pots
cons: Works well with a variety of meals, but some report that it may leave some cream-based dishes scorched

customer_reviews.title: Worked Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mixer specifically to try when making French Onion Soup. The SAKI was attached to a 5 Quart pot. I then added four cut up baseball size yellow sweat onions along with a cut up stick of butter and some red wine. With the temp set for 210 degrees I turned on the stirrer. It had plenty of power to handle this batch of onions. Every 20 minutes or so I would go into the pot with a wooden spoon to assist the mixing from top to bottom as the onions cooked down. The SAKI stirrer worked perfectly. Very easy to clean. This device will get some use in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Paul E. Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't turn on
customer_reviews.text: I had to order this/return it twice - both times the motor broke. The first order wouldn't turn on even after a full cycle of charging. I sent that one back and they sent a replacement. Second order after a full charged worked for about 15 minutes and then gave the "alarm" for low battery. I charged the unit for a full cycle and it will no longer turn on. Had to return that one as well. Seeing as I've tried this twice and neither of them worked I'm giving up, which is too bad because I really could use an automatic stirrer when I make cheese.

product_meta.title: SAKI Automatic Pot Stirrer for Cooking, with 2 speeds, Adjustable, Hands Free, BPA free, Cordless and Rechargeable
feature_bullets: ✅ POWERFUL AUTOMATIC HOT POT MIXER – Imagine leaving your pots unattended without worrying about burning your food. The Saki self-stirring pot utensil will gently stir your stews, soups, sauces, porridge & risottos, releasing the tastiest fresh flavors.

✅ FULLY ADJUSTABLE FOR YOUR COLLECTION OF POTS & PANS – The Saki Electric Stirrer is not a regular stirring tool or stirring machine. Its dynamic arms are designed to easily fit a wide range of saucepans (6-10.2 inches diameter, 4-8 inches height).

✅ AUTOSTIRRER IS BEST FOR SMART, HEALTHY COOKING - BPA free, Cordless and Rechargeable, Saki Autostirrer is an innovative kitchen gadget that enhances the cooking experience with the joy of hands-free stirring and 2 speeds for extra peace of mind.

✅ FAST-CHARGING AND ULTRA-QUIET – ALLOW IT 4 HOURS to RECHARGE, then let it handle all the hot food stirring, so you can focus on anything else. Perfect accessory for smooth sauces, delicate soups or even thicker meals, cereals, rich chunky stews.

✅ ULTRA PROTECTIVE OF YOUR TIME, POTS & MEALS – Stirring to perfection, the Saki Pot Mixer takes creaminess to another level, saving precious cookware sets from hollandaise, porridge, gravy, sauce or custards. Fun & easy cooking!
